name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, HIGHER EDUCATION ASSISTANCE AGENCY (PHEAA), Appellant, v. STATE EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT BOARD
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. State Employees' Retirement Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, and MONTEMURO, JJ.
CASTILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, HIGHER EDUCATION ASSISTANCE AGENCY (PHEAA), Appellant, v. STATE EMPLOYEES’ RETIREMENT BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
CASTILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard H. Glanton, Marilyn Heffley, Barbara R. Binis, Philadelphia, for PHEAA.
Jeffrey B. Clay, Harrisburg, for S.E.R.B.
casebody.head_matter:
636 A.2d 629
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, HIGHER EDUCATION ASSISTANCE AGENCY (PHEAA), Appellant, v. STATE EMPLOYEES’ RETIREMENT BOARD.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1994.
Decided Feb. 15, 1994.
Richard H. Glanton, Marilyn Heffley, Barbara R. Binis, Philadelphia, for PHEAA.
Jeffrey B. Clay, Harrisburg, for S.E.R.B.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, and MONTEMURO, JJ.
